channel.title: Sublime on 好久不见
channel.description: Recent content in Sublime on 好久不见

item.title: Sublime.Plugin
item.description: 参考 sublime插件开发 结构 Packages plugin-fodler plugin.sublime-package(.zip) default key/ menu/ setup user read at lastest plugin-command Text Commands: current view Window Commands: current windows Application Commands: nothing 注： sublime 会将继承 plugin-command 的类去掉 Command 后缀，并将驼峰格式转换为下划线格式 流程
